name: Shoot N' Run
description: This a Demo of the game right now so it doesn't have a lot of the things that the full game will have, like all of the unlocks, right now it only has New York. Plus, you can only buy the guns right now, even though they don't do anything. But everything will work in the future. If you find any bugs or other things, comment them. If it is a bug comment what happened along with, preferably, with a picture of what happened.
